Package Control

Class StudentCourseControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.StudentCourseControl
  • public class StudentCourseControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class to manage function related to courses for a student. Functions: addCourse, dropCourse, printCourseRegistered, changeIndexNumberOfCourse swapIndexNumberWithPeers, checkCourseRegistered, timeClashBetweenModules

                                            Student peer,
                                            java.lang.String courseCode,
                                            int studentIndex,
                                            int peerIndex)
        Function to swap index number of course with peer
        Parameters:
        student - Student object to swap index number of course with
        peer - Student object to swap index number of course with
        courseCode - the course code of the course to swap index
        studentIndex - current index number of the Student object
        peerIndex - current index number of the peer Student object

      • timeClashBetweenModules

        public static java.lang.Boolean timeClashBetweenModules​(Student student,
                                                        Course courseToReg,
                                                        IndexNumber indexToReg)
        Function to check for timetable clash for a student
        Parameters:
        student - Student object to register a course
        courseToReg - Course to be registered
        indexToReg - Index in course to be registered
        Returns:
        True if there is clash, False otherwise
